lines.text: Baby's fat. You fat... fat and juicy.
Do you always try to stop trespassers by hanging yourself?
We're gonna be french fries! Human french fries!

[while looking at a road map]
We are not lost, we're right here somewhere on this little blue line.
This road is not a blue line, it's a dotted line, if it's even on the map at all!
This is air force rescuewwwwww, what's up ?
We're being attacked. I don't know who. We have one gun with 2 bullets. We're sitting ducks!
We recommend that until we can get to you, you stand on your heads, with your thumbs up.

[Beast pushed Mercury off a cliff, killing him. Pluto heard the fall and stops walking]
I thought I heard rocks falling or something.
You got rocks in your head, asshole! Keep walking!
Sounded like some sort of animal.
Yeah well, if animals around here are smart enough to run radios we're up shitcreek without a paddle.
You know you never used language like that before you moved to New York City.
